text:
Fielmann Ventures | Hamburg, Germany | Onsite, Full Time, Visa, Relocation

We are the research & development department of Germany's largest spectacle retailer and design the future of the optical/retail industry. We evaluate technologies, develop retail concepts and build prototypes at a fast pace.

Positions

- Frontend Designer

- Frontend Developer

- Researcher Algebraic Geometry

- 3D Developer OpenGL and/or Direct3D

More information at http://www.fielmann-ventures.com/en/jobs/

Our hiring process: phone interview (screening) -> coding challenge -> phone interview (technical) -> interview (onsite)
